citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 on
30-Jan-17.
Contacted licensee. She stated she had personal business to deal with.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
